name: VideoPlayer
description: Class used to setup a new video player component.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: "location": CSS selector of the element that will hold the video player. Default: "body"."type": File extension of the video(s). Default: "mp4"."path"*: Either string value of the path to the video file or an array of string values of paths. "autoplay": Boolean value of whether the video should begin playing automatically on load. Default: true."muted": Boolean value of whether the video should begin muted. Default: false."loop": Boolean value of whether the video should replay upon completion. Default: false."controls": Boolean value of whether the video player should have controls. Default: true."width": Number or String value of the width of the video player. Default: "auto"."height": Number or String value of the height of the video player. Default: "auto"."label": String value of the labeling used for the video player elements. Default: "bnmrVideoPlayer".

name: play
description: Begins or resumes playback of video.

name: mute
description: Mutes the playback of the video.

name: unmute
description: Unmutes the playback of the video.

name: toggleMute
description: Toggles the mute state of the video.

name: next
description: If the component has a playlist, skips to the next video. If at the last video, begins playback of the first video and plays through playlist again

name: previous
description: If the component has a playlist, begins playback of previous video. If at first video, begins playback of last video in playlist.
